page.title: 20Recreation.
page.content: We talked to quite a few people about their spare time activities.Lots of grown-ups said they were usually busy around the house, gardening and DIY being most popular.In the summer most people liked to visit the beach and swimming in the sea was especially popular with the children.Fishing is another popular pastime amongst young and old. For most leisure activities people end to travel out of the area: to Canterbury for the swimming pool and into Herne Bay for sports activities,drama and operatic socities,sailing clubs,gymnastics clubs and sports teams such as roller hockey, hockey, netball and football.Many activities in our block are for older people such as gardening clubs and associations for retired people.
